author: danhaywood
msg: * overloaded AdapterManager#adapterFor(TypedOid), to specify whether concurrency checking is required or not
* removed configuration property for enabling/disabling concurrency checking, no longer needed
* Wicket viewer's entity editor now uses the concurrency checking feature
* concurrency checking now resets the version of the provided oid as a side-effect

author: bvahdat
msg: CAMEL-5483: Aligned camel-neo4j inside the POM hierarchy to be the same as other components, added it into the release kit, corrected the packaging type to be 'bundle' instead of 'jar'. Also add the Apache legal files.

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-248: organizing imports on some classes, no functional changes
